name: Hammer
des: Our hammer is made of pure metal. Which is long lasting. Currently our hammer is at the top of popularity.

name: Drill Machine
des: Made of perfect material, verified by mechanical engineer. This drill machine is the best in quality.

name: Nut Bolts
des: Made of high quality and pure iron. Which is strong and lasts a long time. There is no fear of rust.

name: Hacksaw
des: A world-class saw made of thin, strong and pure metal and iron that can be easily cut. Which is chronic.

name: Measuring Tape
des: Thin, durable tape. Which can be easily and accurately measured. Not likely to be wrong. Long lasting.

name: Pliers
des: Extremely strong, durable, easily portable. By which cable etc. can be cut very easily.
